author: 0xtylerholmes_
content:
Pardon if this is a dumb question, but I had a question about the methodology for calculating justified and finalized checkpoints. [link](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/specs/phase0/beacon-chain.md#justification-and-finalization)

The weighting for attestations does not include active_slashed validators (`get_attesting_balance`)
but it compares it to the total balance that includes slashed validators. (`get_total_active_balance`)

Am I missing something? I don't see why `active_slashed` validators get to contribute (negatively) to the voting weight of non-slashed validators?
e.g. if 1/3 of total balance weight is `active_slashed` validators we can't justify a new checkpoint.

author: 0xtylerholmes_
content: Also if their weight isn't included, why do we still schedule them a portion of a committee and index their attestations?
